title: All the places I've lived.
name: All the places I've lived.
description:
A Map by Summercushman

The beginning of a big collage.

properties.name: Alki House
properties.description: Posted by Summercushman2571 56th SW Seattle, WAThis is one of the coolest houses I\'ve ever lived in. We we\'re a block from the beach and my sister and I had the entire upstairs...two little rooms across the hall from one another with slanted ceilings. My bed was a matress on a part of the floor that was raised up. At 12 I felt so urban! I hated my scary junior high though. We didn\'t live here long.

properties.name: Chicago Apartment
properties.description: Posted by Summercushman1191 S Taylor Ave, Oak Park, IL 60304Our happy home in Chicago. This was a true respite from community life. And we could see the Sear\'s Tower from our window.

properties.name: Empire and Crestline
properties.description: Posted by SummercushmanThis is near my 2nd house (I don\'t know the specific address). This is where my parents moved after the river house. It was probably their first independent house. I\'ve seen a picture of my mom or dad (I can\'t remember which) sitting on the front porch with a dog.

properties.name: Home
properties.description: Posted by Summercushman6902 N Westgate Pl Spokane, WAWhen I think of my childhood home, this is it. We moved back to Spokane and in with John. I went to a completely different, yet equally horible Junior High and met Jeremy Cushman (of course we wouldn\'t date for another 7 or so years!). My parents got married here. This is it...this is home. We had a pool, we felt rich. It was odd and hard to transition.

properties.name: My first apartment
properties.description: Posted by SummercushmanWow...all alone. My first (and only really) solo living experience. My first apartment. John had showed me studio\'s downtown, but they scared me. This one looked like home. I had a deck overlooking a courtyard. I decorated it and ate nothing but white rice, captain crunch, and hamburger helper. I got ill. I was 17 or 18 and I felt so grown up.

properties.name: Our first apartment
properties.description: Posted by SummercushmanJeremy and I moved to Seattle. We had been together only 6 months at this point. We moved with in with Sarah. Jeremy starting working all the time and Sarah and I found this apartment. Lauri and Lanei eventually moved in next door. Jeremy and I got married while we lived here. We started college and found God. How did we survive it?

properties.name: Our home in Indiana
properties.description: Posted by Summercushman100 Randolph St, Richmond, IN 47374This is where we are going to live while I attend ESR...we haven\'t even seen it yet. But it has a wrap around porch!

properties.name: The Wench's House...
properties.description: Posted by Summercushman158 N Taylor Ave, Oak Park, IL 60302All I can say is...whoops!

properties.name: Washington Water Power
properties.description: Posted by Summercushman1411 E Mission Ave spokane, WaThis is where Washington Water Power is. It\'s close to where my parents lived when I was born. My grandma lived there and they had a little house on the property. They called it the house by the river (I think). It\'s just an empty lot now.
